title: Coleslaw cucumber sticks
description: Make these simple, healthy snacks to take to the office, or for your kids to take to school. They are ready in seconds.

show.b01ncdlj: I Can Cook on the Go

default: ½ cucumber, sliced in half lengthways, seeds scraped out using a teaspoon

steps: Cut the cucumber into four pieces.
Mix the apple, carrot and beetroot together in a mixing bowl. Stir in the cream cheese until well combined.
Fill each piece of cucumber with a little of the cream cheese mixture.
Sprinkle each filled piece of cucumber with raisins. Wrap separately in cling film and chill in the fridge until needed.
